message: No religion on Earth has ever been progressive, nor has there been any scientific influence that helped improving human lives by adding any technologic value to World civilization except, their self-righteous doctrines, and social and moral rules. It was ancient Greek and Egypt, 5000 - 1000 BC, long before Islam, which provided the first blueprints of engineering for modern civilization, and the apparatus that helped men to build temples, cities, roads, and aqua docks. So, Al Jazeera, check your schooling again.
